pages.text: The following mods are approved and allowed for use on this server: $(br)$(li)$(l:https://modrinth.com/mod/journeymap)Journey Map $(li)$(l:https://modrinth.com/mod/zoomify)Zoomify $(li)$(l:https://modrinth.com/mod/inventory-profiles-next)Inventory Profiles $(li)$(l:https://modrinth.com/mod/appleskin)AppleSkin $()$(br2)If you have any complaints or would like to request approval please do so $(l:https://github.com/ZekeSmith/HexMC/issues)here
